name: Nah, see? Cookies!
description:
Wait.. are those... zombies? Nah, See? Cookies!

Explore the table, defend yourself from the endless hordes of zombies cookies, make some burgers and buy upgrades!

Survive as long as you can, and try to destroy the cookie makers to finish the game.

With the leaderboard, you'll get to see how good you are for destroying those pesky zombies cookies.
